about_the_game:
Get ready to dominate the race with the car of the most ruthless megalomaniac boss straight from the Street Fighter universe. Red like his signature military uniform, with the famous winged skull on the visor cap and his black cape, this massive truck doesn’t just faithfully copy Bison's look, it also embodies his thirst for victory.

A full power and oversized pick-up, perfect for your oversized ego! With his ghastly white eyes, M. Bison has zero tolerance for failure, so show off your special moves and hit your opponents mercilessly, like a boss! For them ... it's already GAME OVER!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1
detailed_description:
Get ready to dominate the race with the car of the most ruthless megalomaniac boss straight from the Street Fighter universe. Red like his signature military uniform, with the famous winged skull on the visor cap and his black cape, this massive truck doesn’t just faithfully copy Bison's look, it also embodies his thirst for victory.

A full power and oversized pick-up, perfect for your oversized ego! With his ghastly white eyes, M. Bison has zero tolerance for failure, so show off your special moves and hit your opponents mercilessly, like a boss! For them ... it's already GAME OVER!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Dominate the race with the most ruthless megalomaniac boss, straight from the Street Fighter universe. An oversized pick-up for your oversized ego! Show off your special moves and for your opponents, it’s already GAME OVER!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
